seo.title: API3 DAO Referral Scheme
seo.description: The API3 referral scheme has been created to harness the potential of our robust ecosystem and community partners to support the growth objectives of the DAO.
seo.keywords: API3, DAO, Referral, Scheme, Affiliate, Partner, dAPI, DeFi, Oracle, API, Ecosystem, Community, Growth, Incentive, Rewards, Program, Integration, Protocol, TVL, Team, Marketing, Docs, Listing, API3 DAO Referral Scheme

hero.title: Become an API3 Partner
hero.description: The API3 referral scheme has been created to harness the potential of our robust ecosystem and community partners to support the growth objectives of the DAO.

about.title: About the Program
about.description: At the heart of API3's success is a collaborative network of contributors, clients, and influencers, each playing a pivotal role in expanding the reach and impact of our Oracle Stack. API3 DAO seeks to incentivise growth of dAPIs through the introduction of a referral scheme. This programme rewards affiliates for successfully introducing a DeFi protocol that leads to an integration of a dAPI price feed.

getStarted.title: How can I get started?
getStarted.description: Resources have been created to ensure affiliates of API3 DAO are set up to succeed with referrals. Within this space you will find information on:

cards.title: Understanding Your Role
cards.description: A clear outline of what it means to be a referee in our program and how to get started.

cards.title: Target Audience Identification
cards.description: Insights on identifying who you can successfully refer to our network.

cards.title: Support Materials
cards.description: Access to a wealth of resources designed to aid you in your referral efforts.

cards.title: Effective Promotion Tactics
cards.description: Strategies and tips for efficiently spreading the word and making impactful referrals.

cards.title: Onboard dApps For Rewards
cards.description: Within this space you report and validate your integrations to access payments.

rewards.title: How does the referral scheme work?

qualifications.title: What does a qualified dApp look like?
qualifications.description: An integration is defined as a DeFi protocol that is reading a dAPI within their contracts and can be verified on-chain.

cards.title: A DeFi protocol requiring oracles with over $500k TVL
cards.description: A DeFi protocol requiring oracles with over $500k TVL

cards.title: Actively building and have a team
cards.description: Actively building and have a team

cards.title: Open to basic ecosystem marketing such as adding API3 into docs and listing on ecosystem.api3.org
cards.description: Open to basic ecosystem marketing such as adding API3 into docs and listing on ecosystem.api3.org

contact.title: Questions?
contact.description: We look forward to hearing from you, please share any questions.
